Abilities.Name: Melee Attack
Abilities.Description: Swing your weapon at a target in close combat.

Abilities.Name: Ranged Attack
Abilities.Description: Shoot your ranged weapon at a distant target.

Abilities.Name: Power Strike
Abilities.Description: Deliver a powerful melee attack with increased damage.
Abilities.Effect: Exhausted for 1 turn after use

Abilities.Name: Magic Missile
Abilities.Description: Unleash a dart of magical energy that never misses its target.

Abilities.Name: Fireball
Abilities.Description: Create a fiery explosion at a location, damaging all in the area.
Abilities.Effect: Area of effect damage

Abilities.Name: Teleport
Abilities.Description: Instantly transport yourself to a location you can see.
Abilities.Effect: No damage, teleportation ability

Abilities.Name: Sneak Attack
Abilities.Description: Exploit an enemy's distraction to make a deadly strike.
Abilities.Damage: 2d6 piercing damage (additional damage if conditions are met)

Abilities.Name: Evasion
Abilities.Description: Dodge out of harm's way, taking no damage on a successful saving throw.
Abilities.Effect: Avoids damage on a successful saving throw

Abilities.Name: Lockpicking
Abilities.Description: Skillfully open locks and disarm traps.
Abilities.Effect: No damage, utility skill

Abilities.Name: Rage
Abilities.Description: Enter a furious rage, gaining increased strength and resistance to damage.
Abilities.Effect: Bonus damage, resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage

Abilities.Name: Reckless Attack
Abilities.Description: Throw aside all concern for defense to attack with fierce desperation.
Abilities.Effect: Advantage on melee attack rolls, enemies gain advantage on attacks against you

Abilities.Name: Frenzy
Abilities.Description: Attack with wild abandon, making an additional attack on your turn.
Abilities.Effect: Extra melee attack per turn, exhaustion after use

Abilities.Name: Bardic Inspiration
Abilities.Description: Inspire an ally with words or music, granting them a bonus on ability checks, attack rolls, or saving throws.
Abilities.Effect: Bonus to ability checks, attack rolls, or saving throws

Abilities.Name: Charm Person
Abilities.Description: Magically charm a humanoid, making them friendly towards you.
Abilities.Effect: Target becomes friendly towards you for a duration

Abilities.Name: Countercharm
Abilities.Description: Use music or words to disrupt mind-influencing effects on yourself and allies.
Abilities.Effect: Advantage on saving throws against fear, charm, or other mind-affecting effects

Abilities.Name: Healing Word
Abilities.Description: Invoke divine energy to heal an ally's wounds.
Abilities.Effect: Heals a target for a certain amount of hit points

Abilities.Name: Turn Undead
Abilities.Description: Channel your deity's power to drive away undead creatures.
Abilities.Effect: Forces undead to flee or be destroyed

Abilities.Name: Divine Smite
Abilities.Description: Infuse your weapon with holy energy, dealing extra damage to fiends and undead.
Abilities.Effect: Additional radiant damage to fiends and undead

Abilities.Name: Wild Shape
Abilities.Description: Transform into an animal form, gaining its abilities.
Abilities.Effect: Assume the form and abilities of a beast

Abilities.Name: Entangle
Abilities.Description: Cause plants in an area to ensnare creatures, restraining them.
Abilities.Effect: Restrains creatures in an area

Abilities.Name: Call Lightning
Abilities.Description: Summon a bolt of lightning to strike a target from the sky.
Abilities.Effect: Lightning damage to a target

Abilities.Name: Flurry of Blows
Abilities.Description: Unleash a rapid series of unarmed strikes against a target.
Abilities.Effect: Two extra unarmed strikes as a bonus action

Abilities.Name: Patient Defense
Abilities.Description: Focus on defense, allowing you to dodge attacks more effectively.
Abilities.Effect: Dodge action as a bonus action

Abilities.Name: Stunning Strike
Abilities.Description: Deliver a stunning blow to incapacitate a target temporarily.
Abilities.Effect: Target must make a saving throw or be stunned

Abilities.Name: Lay on Hands
Abilities.Description: Use your healing touch to restore hit points to a creature.
Abilities.Effect: Heals a target for a certain amount of hit points

Abilities.Name: Divine Smite
Abilities.Description: Infuse your weapon with holy energy, dealing extra damage to fiends and undead.
Abilities.Effect: Additional radiant damage to fiends and undead

Abilities.Name: Aura of Protection
Abilities.Description: Radiate an aura that adds a bonus to saving throws for yourself and nearby allies.
Abilities.Effect: Bonus to saving throws for self and nearby allies

Abilities.Name: Hunter's Mark
Abilities.Description: Mark a target, gaining extra damage against them and tracking their location.
Abilities.Effect: Additional damage to a marked target, tracking ability

Abilities.Name: Animal Companion
Abilities.Description: Befriend and train a loyal animal companion to aid you in battle.
Abilities.Effect: Summons an animal companion to assist in combat

Abilities.Name: Evasion
Abilities.Description: Dodge out of harm's way, taking no damage on a successful saving throw.
Abilities.Effect: Avoids damage on a successful saving throw

Abilities.Name: Magic Missile
Abilities.Description: Unleash a dart of magical energy that never misses its target.

Abilities.Name: Fireball
Abilities.Description: Create a fiery explosion at a location, damaging all in the area.
Abilities.Effect: Area of effect damage

Abilities.Name: Teleport
Abilities.Description: Instantly transport yourself to a location you can see.
Abilities.Effect: No damage, teleportation ability

Abilities.Name: Eldritch Blast
Abilities.Description: Project a beam of eldritch energy at a target.

Abilities.Name: Hex
Abilities.Description: Place a curse on a target, making them more vulnerable to your attacks.
Abilities.Effect: Target has disadvantage on ability checks tied to a chosen ability

Abilities.Name: Pact of the Chain
Abilities.Description: Form a pact with a celestial, fiend, or fey, gaining a loyal familiar.
Abilities.Effect: Summons a familiar to assist in various ways
